title: Kaniz Fatema
text:
Ph.D. Student in Software Engineering Software and Societal Systems Department • School of Computer Science Carnegie Mellon University


Email: yourname [at] example [dot] edu   •   GitHub   /   CV   /   Google Scholar







Update: Back at CMU after an internship at Microsoft Research.


Hi! I am a Ph.D. student in Software Engineering at Carnegie Mellon University advised by … During my Ph.D., I have worked on safe robot learning, large language models, and AI safety.


Research Interests



Safe and robust robot learning


Reinforcement learning and control barrier functions


Foundation models for embodied AI
